author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes a bug introduced in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44767 where a `return` when the worker is not selected was moved inside a lambda passed to `convertException()`. This PR fixes the function to return at the same spot as before if the worker is not selected.

Thanks to @Dr15Jones for figuring out the cause.

Fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44888, and potentially addresses https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44887

#### PR validation:

Workflow 4.17 succeeded in CMSSW_14_1_ASAN_X_2024-05-01-2300
title: Fix Worker::prePrefetchSelectionAsync() to return early when not selected
